text.section: Each director of a commercial bank shall attend at least one half of the regularly scheduled board meetings that are held during the director's term of office.

section.section: Any director who fails to attend meetings of the board of directors as required by this section is disqualified automatically from serving as director for a succeeding term.
The Commissioner may waive the disqualification of a director if the director shows to the Commissioner good cause for the failure to attend the meetings.
